title: 84/195/EEC: Commission Decision of 26 March 1984 authorizing the French Republic to apply intra-Community surveillance to imports of certain types of wood (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 26 March 1984
authorizing the French Republic to apply intra-Community surveillance to imports of certain types of wood
(Only the French text is authentic)
(84/195/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The French Republic is hereby authorized to apply intra-Community surveillance until 31 December 1984 in accordance with Decision 80/47/EEC, in
respect of imports of the products indicated below originating in third countries and in free circulation in the other Member States:
1.2.3 //   //   //   // CCT heading No  // NIMEXE code  // Description  //   //   //   // ex 44.05 C  // 44.05-40  // Other coniferous wood sawn lengthwise, sliced or peeled, but not further prepared, of a thickness exceeding 5 mm  //  //   //
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 March 1984.
For the Commission
Wilhelm HAFERKAMP
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 16, 22. 1. 1980, p. 14.
(2) OJ No L 58, 29. 2. 1984, p. 1.
